title: Homemade Cone Ice Cream || 3 varieties || Vanilla Cone Ice Cream 🍦 | Christmas 🎄 sprinkles Cone Ice Cream | Red rainbow🌈 sprinkles Cone Ice Cream || Christmas Special 🎄
content:
Dessert 🍨 🍦 - Ice Cream 🍦  Duration: 15 mins Freezing time: 10 -12 hrs Every one says "yes" to have a cup of ice cream / Cone Ice cream which gives you more happiness while eating and at small parties with friends or family members. This December month is Christmas season 🎄 Every where in home or outside you can see decorations, treats, parties and happy treats with a scoop of ice cream.. Let's celebrate this coming Christmas 🎄 with Cone Ice cream. I prepared super delicious Cone Ice cream in three different varieties they are rich in taste and adorable. Today I prepared Cone Ice cream with readymade cones and used Sprinkle mix Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Heavy Whipping Cream – 1 tin – 473 ml – cold
  • Condensed Milk – 1 tin – 400 gms – cold
  • Sprinkles - 5 types
  • Cones - 3
  • Vanilla extract - 1/2 tb sp
Procedure:
  • Take a mixing bowl
  • Add whipping cream
  • Mix it till stiff peaks by using hand mixer
  • Next add condensed milk & vanilla extract
  • Mix till incorporated
  • Vanilla ice cream base is ready
  • Divide ice cream base in three containers
Christmas Tree 🎄 Sprinkles Cone:
  • In small containers,
  • In first small container add 1/2 tb sp green sugar & 1/2 tb sp Christmas tree sprinkles
  • Mix well & Close container
  • Refrigerate 10-12 hrs or overnight for best results
  • After 12 hrs take out ice cream container
  • Scoop on cone
  • On Cone Sprinkle green sugar & Christmas tree sprinkles
  • Christmas Tree 🌲 Sprinkle cone Ice cream ready 😋
Red Rainbow 🌈 Sprinkles cone:
  • In second small containers add 1/2 tb sp Red sugar & 1/2 tb sp Rainbow sprinkles
  • Mix well
  • Close container
  • Refrigerate 10-12 hrs or overnight for best results
  • After 12 hrs take out ice cream container
  • Scoop on cone
  • On Cone Sprinkle red sugar & rainbow 🌈 sprinkles
  • Red Rainbow 🌈 Sprinkle Cone Ice Cream ready 😋
Vanilla Cone Ice Cream:
  • Close container
  • Refrigerate 10-12 hrs or overnight for best results
  • After 12 hrs take out ice cream container
  • Scoop on cone
  • Sprinkle with snow flake sprinkles & Rainbow sprinkles
  • Vanilla ice cream cone 🍦 is ready
Step by step process shown below with pictures:   Note:
  • You can also use sweetened/ dark Choco chips or any other toppings according to your preference
  • Even you can add strawberry/ Rose water essence to the base ice cream
  • If you have kitchen aid attachment prepare base ice cream on medium speed
  • Serve immediately
  • No Cone at home, don't worry 😉 scoop out in ice cream bowl 🍨🍧
